skillTree.localised_description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.
Excellent Elven chariots, barded with priceless Ithilmar for extra protection on the battlefield but at no cost in speed or agility.
The youngest Dragons have a warm hue to their scales and a fiery temper, with scorching breath to match.
Those facing a great challenge, a difficult decision, or simply in need of luck, may call upon the Goddess of Dreams and Fortune.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +8% when increasing

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Few races possess the magical prowess required to bend the Winds to their will without shattering their soul. The Asur are one of them.
Practiced mages have an innate connection to the Winds.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +1

skillTree.localised_description: She could likely fill an entire section of the Library with her knowledge, should she ever choose to leave the battlefield and return home.

skillTree.localised_description: Her calming presence can instill patience and wisdom into even the most impetuous White Tower aspirant.

skillTree.localised_description: Weaving all of the winds into a protective ward, the mage protects all nearby Asur from magical attacks.
Those who seek greater understanding will find when time comes.

Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(own armies in province)

Winds of Magic power reserve change: +15% when increasing
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: The tragic fate of all Elven souls not bound to the Great Forest or protected by waystones is to suffer for eternity in the Black Pit. Those who understand this will not allow the Pale Queen a chance to seize their soul.

Winds of Magic cost: -1% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: Asuryan’s silver bow and its golden arrows strike alongside the Asur.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The Asur mage sears an imprint of the eight Winds of Magic onto his enemy that marks him for doom.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(all units in army)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one can never leave something alone. They always have to meddle.

effects.description:
Construction cost: +10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Much of the Ulthuan skyline built over the last thousand years is down to this one’s sterling endeavours.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If it requires accuracy and organisation, this one is your Elf. Not so much fun at parties, however.

effects.description:
Construction time: -20% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: There's usually a right way and a wrong way to do anything. This one generally gets it wrong.
"Too late, too late!" will be the cry, when the one with the bargains passes you by.
"There's always a way - always an angle. You just have to find it."
Machinery - and indeed progress of any kind - is anathema to this one, because there's no substitute for good, honest toil.
Fortunately, there are some who really apply themselves to the problems of the world. Just as well, otherwise we'd be… Oh wait...

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +3%
	(own characters in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An individual of exceptional skill and worth; the very embodiment of sagacity.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +25%
	(own characters in region)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -25%
	(enemy characters in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: They say two are better than one. They are, of course, totally wrong in every respect.
Impressively energetic for a thousand years old - even by their own reckoning.
"Staying this supple takes effort. You don’t get definition like that by sitting about and drinking."
Looking "not too well" has become a permanent condition. Clearly, they're lacking essential herbs.
Chance is like magic - it can be harnessed to the individual's will.
"If you need anything, there are guards outside the doors. Many guards."
If ever there was a candidate for a relaxing break at an all-inclusive spa, it was this one.
Every fibre of their being is charged and ready for action - wherever, whenever.
Through their veins a charge is racing. Energy, filling the ominous void within.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one doesn't even relax in their own company, so reserved is their nature.
Definitely not the life and soul of the party; they exude melancholy and depression.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Not every cloud has a silver lining.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Cool, calm, and collected. Yeah, right!
Action, inaction, change - you name it, this one will work against the prevailing wind.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 5% for infantry units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Whatever quality is needed to stand guard over the Asur way of life, this one has it in abundance.
Fortitude? Strength of character? Do me a favour - this yellow-bellied poltroon has none.

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: +1 turn for Phoenix units (minimum 1)
	(own local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Tempers, like wicks, can be ignited. Watch the anger burn.

effects.description:
Ward save: 5% for Phoenix units
	(Hero's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You don't want to be on the wrong side of this one's ire - it's explosive to say the least!
